messages.message: hi @Weiming Wu wondering if the agent mode/legacy mode pill has been backported to 25.34? Asking because if I need to backport my autogenerate schema API changes to 25.34 as well. cc @Serena

We decided against backporting it to .34...
I thought that we're only trying to push bug fixes to .34, and this feels more like a feature, but I'll defer to product and management on this
i'm personally fine with not backporting to .34, the merge conflicts weren't friendly there and it didn't seem like the right release to backport at the time.

@margaret.tomaszczuk @Anil is it ok if we don't backport agent mode frontend fixes to 25.34?

this means that if customers want to use agent mode in ST environments, they will need to use 25.36 (ie get an emergency deployment ahead of the normal ST deployment schedule)
we may not have a better option at this point -- shouldn't be more than 2-3 tenants max so probably feasible.
Who do we need to connect with on that to give them a heads up?
i'm not sure which customers urgently want to try out agent mode - maybe you can ask in <#CKBRX13L5|> or a channel with the CEMs?
clarifying question: do we need to identify those by today?
I do have a short list from BG
I meant on the actual release coordination Serena, I can own identifying who needs it!

i've seen CEMs request emergency deployments of the MT GA release version in <#C051YU4AQ9Y|> and tag the relevant infra folks (ie Sudeep and JP, example (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C051YU4AQ9Y/p1756310569084369)), so i think that's what we would need to do
got it - let me confirm short list with BG and get that going.
so to confirm, we should backport all FE fixes to just 25.36 going forward?

if that's what's best for velocity / stability, yes. but there's overhead with the ST deployment mgmt so let's just be thoughtful about it!

defer to you and @Anil.
also not sure if there's risk with the fact that we've merged some features to .34 at this point. but again defer to ya'll

we've backported all backend bug fixes to 25.34 and 25.36

but i think that the frontend has some new features (agent/legacy mode pill, autogenerate schema) that would be safer to just backport to 25.36
